mapper.insert: insert into internal_training( it_id, training_man, department, duty, course_name, training_date, training_location, training_money,training_desc,training_reason,training_in_user,training_type,director) values(#{training.itId},#{training.trainingMan},#{training.department},#{training.duty},#{training.courseName}, #{training.trainingDate},#{training.trainingLocation},#{training.trainingMoney},#{training.trainingDesc}, #{training.trainingReason},#{training.trainingInUser},#{training.trainingType},#{training.director})
mapper.update: update internal_training set training_man=#{training.trainingMan},department=#{training.department}, duty=#{training.duty},course_name=#{training.courseName},training_date=#{training.trainingDate}, training_location=#{training.trainingLocation},training_money=#{training.trainingMoney}, training_desc=#{training.trainingDesc},training_reason=#{training.trainingReason}, training_in_user=#{training.trainingInUser},training_type=#{training.trainingType}, director=#{training.director} where it_id=#{training.itId}
mapper.select: select a.*,d.duty_name,c.u_name from internal_training as a left join mode_status as b on a.it_id=b.mode_id left join user as c on a.training_man=c.user_id left join duty as d on a.duty=d.duty_id where b.status=2

SELECT a.*,b.om_name,d.duty_name,c.u_name FROM internal_training as a LEFT JOIN organization_management as b on a.department=b.om_id left join user as c on a.training_man=c.user_id left join duty as d on a.duty=d.duty_id where a.it_id=#{id}
select it_id,course_name from internal_training as a left join mode_status as b on a.it_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2
